channel.title: Slides on English Version
channel.description: Recent content in Slides on English Version

item.title: Two examples of iteration with purrr - Class for the RStudio certification
item.description: RStudio Certification I recently became certified as a RStudio Tidyverse Instructor. To pass the certification there are two exams. In this post, I am going to share a 15 minute class that I prepared to as part of the teaching exam. What to teach about? I use loops frequently for my postdoc as I need to automate tasks. That is why I decided to teach two specific examples of iteration using functions in purrr package.

item.title: Interactive web applications with Shiny - meetup material
item.description: Hello! In February I will participate in a meetup of the R-Ladies chapter R-Ladies Resistencia-Corrientes and the R user group R en el NEA. These groups represent the R users in the cities of Resistencia and Corrientes, Argentina. The meetup consists of a workshop where attendees learn to build their own apps. This material improves the one that I presented in an R-Ladies Buenos Aires meetup in 2017.
